page.title: 10LANDSCAPE.RURAL.RIVER VALLEY
page.content: {River Fal North Terras Bridge.}"Maggie Pie"Mica Dam,waste storage for China Clay Industry.{Bridging Point.}Old Mill converted to Market Garden.A 3058 Hallivick.{River Valley southwards.} River Fal flows through mature valley, flat flood plain,river braiding.Valley sides gentle slopes.Valley floor 46m high, hill tops 110m.Disused mines, shafts,engine houses.Spoil heaps of Uranium,Copper & Iron Ore mines.{ {Settlement.}Scattered farms,cottages served by secondary roads & tracks.{ {Land Use.}Valley floor-mixture of grass,rough grazing & woodland.Valley sides-fields grazing,fodder crops, barley & oats.Carnwinnick Wood. Trenowth Wood.Main line railway & viaduct.Tributary valley/Coombe River. New-North Fal sewage works.
